task.title: Testing Colorblind Accessibility
task.shortdesc: Now that you have for final image, it's time to test for colorblindness accessibility! Testing for accessibility, especially for colorblind users, ensures the final design is visible for individuals with all ranges of color vision deficiency.

step.cmd: click Open In to access the plugin in your designated Figma project.

step.hazardstatement: A popup wil appear to select the kinds of colroblindness you would like to> test for. </>hazardstatementhazardstatement

step.cmd: Select all the types of color vision you would like to emulate
